text: Laurie Strode is a fictional character in the Halloween movies. The first movie she was in was the 1978 movie. She is an example of the "final girl" character, the last girl alive to fight the killer in a movie. Jamie Lee Curtis was the first actress to play Laurie Strode. Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1978 Category:Movie characters Category:Halloween (franchise) Category:Horror movie characters Category:Fictional orphans
title: Laurie Strode
